html:
Advanced Mechanics Design

You will explore how adding a dimension to gameplay adds to the possibilities of what can be created. On completion of this module, you will be able to design complex mechanics with an understanding of how the end user will interact with them

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Research effective methods to create interesting gameplay in 3D virtual space.

+  Critique mechanics and their code structure.

+  Design clean code structures for the creation of complex game mechanics.

+  Communicate the planned structures and intention of mechanics.

Module Content:
